definition: (idiom) (of soldiers) highly disciplined, not committing the slightest offence against civilians
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Seeing the troops not encroaching on the local people’s interests in the least the villagers who had been hiding in the mountains came back home one after another.
sentences.chinese: 看到部队秋毫无犯，躲到山上的村民陆续回到家中。

definition: to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
to fortify defenses and raze the fields (idiom); to leave nothing for the invader/scorched earth policy
to receive troops with food and drink (idiom)/to give troops a hearty welcome/also pr. [dan1 si4 hu2 jiang1]
to recruit surrendered enemy and deserters (idiom); to gather together a gang of villains
to rob the rich to help the poor (idiom)
to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc)/to submit
